question: Where was the festival of Dragon Junk held?
answer1: along the Yangtze-kiang

question: Why were the boys in danger when they performed tricks?
answer1: They were so close to the water.
answer2: They performed tricks close to the water.

question: Who was no more than seven years of age and he was extraordinarily skillful?
answer1: Aduan

question: How did Dsiang feel when her son fell into the water below the Gold Island?
answer1: sad

question: Why didn't Aduan know that he had been drowned?
answer1: met two men who took him along with them and saw a new world in the midst of the waters of the Yellow River

question: What did the old woman do after she met Aduan?
answer1: sat down and had Aduan show his tricks

question: What did the old woman teach Aduan?
answer1: taught him the dance of the flying thunders of Tsian-Tang River and the music that calms the winds on the sea of Dung-Ting

question: What will the Prince of the Dragon's Cave do the following day?
answer1: hold a review of his dancers

question: What did the dancers do for the dance of the Ogres?
answer1: beat upon enormous cymbals

question: What happened when the dance of the Ogres began?
answer1: tremendous waves spouted up to the very skies, and then fell down again like star-glimmer which scatters in the air

question: What will the Prince of the Dragon Cave do during the dance?
answer1: hastily bade the dance cease, and had the dancers of the nightingale round step forth

question: Who were all little girls?
answer1: the swallow dancers

question: Why did Aduan dance alone?
answer1: The Prince of the Dragon Cave was especially desirous of testing Aduan.

question: Why did Aduan hasten to the western courtyard?
answer1: He wanted to meet Rose of Evening.
answer2: He wanted to see Rose of Evening.

question: What did the Dragon Prince give Aduan?
answer1: a garment of five colors and a carbuncle set in golden threads of fish-beard for a hair-jewel

question: Why did Aduan and Rose of Evening only gaze and let their souls go out to each other?
answer1: The strict rules allowed no confusion in the ranks.

question: What did Rose of Evening purposely drop?
answer1: a coral pin fall from her hair

question: How did Mother Hia feel when Aduan was sick?
answer1: unhappy

question: What will happen to Aduan after he meets Rose of Evening?
answer1: He will be sick with longing.
answer2: He will not be able to eat or sleep.

question: What happened to Rose of Evening after she met Aduan?
answer1: She was also sick.

question: Where did the boy lead Aduan?
answer1: a lotus field

question: Why did Aduan's illness leave him?
answer1: He met Rose of Evening at the lotus field.
answer2: He saw Rose of Evening again.

question: How did Aduan feel when he could not see Rose of Evening for months?
answer1: sad

question: Why didn't Aduan see Rose of Evening for months?
answer1: The King had kept back Rose of Evening and one of the nightingale dancers to teach the girls in his castle.

question: What will Aduan do when he hears that Rose of Evening has cast herself into the river?
answer1: tear his beautiful garments, take his gold and his pearls, and go out with the sole idea of following his beloved in death

question: What will happen when Aduan jumps from the tall tree?
answer1: He will return to his home.

question: How will Aduan's mother feel when she sees him?
answer1: joy

question: What will happened when Rose of Evening jumps into the water?
answer1: carried to the surface, and the waves carried and cradled her till a ship came by and took her aboard

question: Why did Aduan's mother dig up her son's grave?
answer1: Aduan's old mother cherished the hope that, after all, perhaps her son had not died.

question: Who was a departed spirit?
answer1: Aduan

question: How did the Dragon Prince know that Aduan was a departed spirit?
answer1: Aduan did not cast a shadow.
